body:
Comment 7 by **aidanphs**: 
Ok, this gist is the output of "cat src/bug.go" (I created a new file to strip down).
The password is exactly as is in the file (now changed...):
https://gist.github.com/aidanhs/7605681

I didn't see the point of putting it on play.golang.org because of the deps...

It's quite hard to reproduce...you have to hammer it with a few thousand requests (I use
"./wrk -t1 -c5 -d10s http://127.0.0.1:9000/golang/abcdefg" in a bash loop..for some
reason if it doesn't happen near the beginning of the 10s, it seems to be fine).

I have a(n 11M) binary I can reproduce it on if you want that at any point.
